Package fr.umlv.escapeirandroid.editor

Interface Summary
AddEnemyTypeFragment.EnemyTypeListener  
BehaviourListFragment.BehaviourListener Listener to transport data to the activity when a behaviour is deleted or renamed
CreateBehaviourFragment.CreateBehaviourListener  
EditLevelDialogFragment.EditLevelListener  
EditorActivity.onLevelChangedListener Interfaces to transfer data to fragments
EditorActivity.onLoadAddEnemyTypesListener  
EditorActivity.onLoadBehaviourListener  
EditorActivity.onLoadEnemyTypesListener  
EnemyListFragment.EnemyListener  
LevelPropertiesFragment.LevelPropertiesListener  
MapEditorView.MapEditorListener Listener to push data to the activity, e.g events on the list dragables enemies
NewLevelDialogFragment.NewLevelListener  
RenameBehaviourDialogFragment.RenameItemListener  
RetrieveLevelFromLinkDialogFragment.NewLevelFromLinkListener  
WelcomeDialogFragment.WelcomeListener This interface provides listeners to transport data somewhere else
 

Class Summary
AddEnemyTypeFragment The Class AddEnemyTypeFragment provides a fragment to load a form to add a new enemyType, when saved gives it back through an EnemyTypeListener
BehaviourListFragment The Class BehaviourListFragment displays a list of the know behaviours, giving the possibility to delete and rename them
BoundingBox The Class BoundingBox provides a moveable bounding box for a Dragable Enemy and contrains it to implement draw and updatePostion
CreateBehaviourFragment The Class CreateBehaviourFragment provides a fragment to draw a behaviour, name it and gives it back trough a CreateBehaviourListener The behaviour is drawn on a GestureOverlayView
DeleteLevelDialogFragment The Class DeleteLevelDialogFragment provides a dialog fragment to delete an existing level
DragableEnemy The Class DragableEnemy is used to move, drag and drop bitmaps representing an enemy in the game
EditLevelDialogFragment The Class EditLevelDialogFragment a list of existing level to edit
EditorActivity The Class EditorActivity is the heart of the editor, it provides several listeners to push data to fragments, also sets several listeners to get data from fragments It is in charge of loading the fragments, managing the menu, collecting data and keep them accurate, and also save a level
EnemyListFragment The Class EnemyListFragment a list of the know enemyType, giving the possibility to delete and rename them
LevelPropertiesFragment The Class LevelPropertiesFragment provides a fragment with a form to edit the level properties, e.g the name, the duration and the background
MapEditorFragment The Class MapEditorFragment contains a MapEditorView to create and edit a game map of enemy
MapEditorView The Class MapEditorView provides a view to move, to drag and drop, to delete dragable enemies, useful to build a game map
NewLevelDialogFragment The Class NewLevelDialogFragment provides a dialog fragment with a form to create a new level
RenameBehaviourDialogFragment The Class RenameBehaviourDialogFragment provides a dialog to rename an item of a list, gives back the newname through a RenameItemListener
RetrieveImageFromLinkDialogFragment The Class RetrieveImageFromLinkDialogFragment provides a dialog fragment to load background image from an HTTP link
RetrieveLevelFromLinkDialogFragment The Class RetrieveLevelFromLinkDialogFragment provides a dialog fragment to load a level from an HTTP link
VerticalScrollView The Class VerticalScrollView extends ScrollView and provides a vertical scrolling for the MapEditorView
WelcomeDialogFragment The Class WelcomeDialogFragment provides a dialog fragment to load various methods to create a level
